arabicText: حمٓ
englishTranslationText:
Ha-Meem*.(*Alphabets of the Arabic 
language; Allah and to whomever He 
reveals, know their precise meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ha-Meem*.	(*Arabi zabān ke huroof jin ke 
ma’āni Allah aur jis par Allah ne inko 
nazil farmaya Wahi jānta hai.)

arabicText: عٓسٓقٓ
englishTranslationText:
A’in-Seen-Qaf*.	(*Alphabets of the Arabic 
language; Allah and to whomever He 
reveals, know their precise meanings.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
A’in-Seen-Qaf*.	(*Arabi zabān ke huroof 
jin ke ma’āni Allah aur jis par Allah ne 
inko nazil faramaya Wahi jānta hai.)

arabicText: كَذَٰلِكَ يُوحِىٓ إِلَيْكَ وَإِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِكَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	how	Allah	the	Most	Honourable,	the	
All	Knowing	sends	the	divine	revelation	to	
you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	
and	blessings	be	upon	him)	and	to	those	
before	you.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yuñhi	waḥi	farmātā	hai	tumhāri	ṭaraf	aur	
tum	se	agloñ	ki	ṭaraf	Allāh	ízzat-o-ḥikmat	
wālā.

arabicText: لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَلِىُّ ٱلْعَظِيمُ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usi	kā	hai	jo	kuch	āasmānoñ	meiñ	hai	aur	
jo	kuch	zameen	meiñ	hai	aur	wohi		bulandi		
wa	'azmat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: تَكَادُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتُ يَتَفَطَّرْنَ مِن فَوْقِهِنَّ ۚ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّهِمْ وَيَسْتَغْفِرُونَ لِمَن فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
The	heavens	nearly	split	apart	from	above	-	and	the	angels	say	the	Purity	of	their	Lord	
while	praising	Him,	and	seek	forgiveness	
for	those	on	earth;	pay	heed!	Indeed	Allah	
only	is	the	Oft	Forgiving,	the	Most	Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Qareeb	hotā	hai	ke	āasmān	apne	oopar	se	
shaq	ho	jāyeñ	aur	Farishte	apne	Rab	ki	
t'areef	ke	sāth	us	ki	pāki	bolte	aur	zameen	
wāloñ	ke	liye	mu'āfi	māñgte	haiñ	sun	lo	
Be-shak	Allāh	hi	bakhsh	ne	wālā	maherbān		
hai,

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ٱللَّهُ حَفِيظٌ عَلَيْهِمْ وَمَآ أَنتَ عَلَيْهِم بِوَكِيلٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	Allah	is	watching	those	who	have	
chosen	supporters	besides	Him;	and	you	
are	not	responsible	for	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jinhoñ	ne	Allāh	ke	siwā	aur	wāli	banā	
rakhe	haiñ	woh	Allāh	ki	nigāh	meiñ	haiñ	
aur	tum	un	ke	ƶimme	dār	nahiñ

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ قُرْءَانًا عَرَبِيًّۭا لِّتُنذِرَ أُمَّ ٱلْقُرَىٰ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَتُنذِرَ يَوْمَ ٱلْجَمْعِ لَا رَيْبَ فِيهِ ۚ فَرِيقٌۭ فِى ٱلْجَنَّةِ وَفَرِيقٌۭ فِى ٱلسَّعِيرِ
englishTranslationText:
And	this	is	how	We	have	divinely	revealed	to	you	the	Qur’an	in	Arabic,	for	you	to	warn	the	people	
of	the	mother	of	all	towns	-	Mecca	-	and	those	around	it,	and	to	warn	of	the	Day	of	Assembling	of	
which	there	is	no	doubt;	a	group	is	in	Paradise,	and	another	group	is	in	hell.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Yuñhi	Ham	ne	tumhāri	ṭaraf	'Arabi	Qur’ān	waḥi	bhejā	ke	tum	darāō	sab	shahroñ	ki	asl	makka	
wāloñ	ko	aur	jitney	us	ke	gird	haiñ	aur	tum	darāō	ekhaththe	hone	ke	din	se	jis	meiñ	kuchh		shak	
nahiñ	aik	giroh	Jannat	meiñ	hai	aur	aik	giroh	dozakh	meiñ.

arabicText: وَلَوْ شَآءَ ٱللَّهُ لَجَعَلَهُمْ أُمَّةًۭ وَٰحِدَةًۭ وَلَـٰكِن يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَآءُ فِى رَحْمَتِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلظَّـٰلِمُونَ مَا لَهُم مِّن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	Allah	willed,	He	could	have	made	them	all	upon	one	religion,	but	He	admits	whomever	
He	wills	into	His	mercy;	and	the	unjust	do	not	have	any	friend	nor	any	supporter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Allāh	chāhtā	to	un	sab	ko	aik	din	par	kar	detā	lekin	Allāh	apni	Raḥmat	meiñ	letā	hai	jise	chāhe	
aur	zālimoñ	kā	na	koyi	dost	na	madadgār

arabicText: أَمِ ٱتَّخَذُوا۟ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوْلِيَآءَ ۖ فَٱللَّهُ هُوَ ٱلْوَلِىُّ وَهُوَ يُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
What!	Have	they	appointed	supporters	other	than	Allah?	So	(know	that)	Allah	only	is	the	
Supporter,	and	He	will	revive	the	dead;	and	He	is	Able	to	do	all	things.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kiyā	Allāh	ke	siwā	aur	wāli	thahrā	liye	haiñ	to	Allāh	hi	wāli	hai	aur	woh	murde	jilāye	(zinda	kare)	
gā	aur	woh	sab	kuchh		kar	saktā	hai

arabicText: وَمَا ٱخْتَلَفْتُمْ فِيهِ مِن شَىْءٍۢ فَحُكْمُهُۥٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبِّى عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَإِلَيْهِ أُنِيبُ
englishTranslationText:
“The	final	decision	for	the	matters	in	which	you	differ	rests	with	Allah;	such	is	my	Lord	-	I	rely	on	
Him;	and	towards	Him	do	I	incline.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	jis	bāt	meiñ	ikhtilāf	karo	to	us	kā	faisla	Allāh	ke	supurd	hai	yeh	hai	Allāh	merā	Rab	maiñ	ne	
us	par	bharosa	kiyā	aur	maiñ	us	ki	ṭaraf	ruju'a	lātā	huñ

arabicText: فَاطِرُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنْ أَنفُسِكُمْ أَزْوَٰجًۭا وَمِنَ ٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ أَزْوَٰجًۭا ۖ يَذْرَؤُكُمْ فِيهِ ۚ لَيْسَ كَمِثْلِهِۦ شَىْءٌۭ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْبَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
The	Maker	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth;	
He	has	created	pairs	for	you	from	
yourselves	and	pairs	from	the	animals;	He	
spreads	your	generation;	nothing	is	like	
Him;	and	He	only	is	the	All	Hearing,	the	All	
Seeing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Āsmānoñ	aur	zameen	kā	banane	wālā	
tumhāre	liye	tumhi	meiñ	se	jorde	banāye	
aur	nar	wa	māda	chaupāye	us	se	tumhāri	
nasl	phailātā	hai	us	jaisā	koyi	nahiñ	aur	
wohi		sunta	dekhtā	hai.

arabicText: لَهُۥ مَقَالِيدُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ يَبْسُطُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَقْدِرُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِكُلِّ شَىْءٍ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
For	Him	only	are	the	keys	of	the	heavens	
and	the	earth;	He	increases	the	sustenance	
for	whomever	He	wills	and	restricts	it;	
indeed	He	is	the	All	Knowing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Usi	ke	liye	haiñ	āasmānoñ	aur	zameen	ki	
kunjiyāñ	rozi	wasí	kartā	hai	jis	ke	liye	
chāhe	aur	tang	farmātā	hai	be-shak	woh	
sab	kuch	jāntā	hai

arabicText: ۞ شَرَعَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلدِّينِ مَا وَصَّىٰ بِهِۦ نُوحًۭا وَٱلَّذِىٓ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ وَمَا وَصَّيْنَا بِهِۦٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ وَعِيسَىٰٓ ۖ أَنْ أَقِيمُوا۟ ٱلدِّينَ وَلَا تَتَفَرَّقُوا۟ فِيهِ ۚ كَبُرَ عَلَى ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ مَا تَدْعُوهُمْ إِلَيْهِ ۚ ٱللَّهُ يَجْتَبِىٓ إِلَيْهِ مَن يَشَآءُ وَيَهْدِىٓ إِلَيْهِ مَن يُنِيبُ
englishTranslationText:
He	has	kept	for	you	the	same	path	of	
religion	which	He	commanded	Nooh,	and	
what	We	divinely	reveal	to	you	(O	dear	
Prophet	Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him),	and	what	We	had	
commanded	to	Ibrahim	and	Moosa	and	
Eisa	that,	“Keep	the	religion	proper,	and	do	
not	create	divisions	in	it”;	the	polytheists	
find	the	matter	what	you	call	them	to	as	
intolerable;	Allah	chooses	for	His	
proximity	whomever	He	wills,	and	guides	
towards	Himself	whoever	inclines	
(towards	Him).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumhāre	liye	Deen	ki	woh	rāh	dāli	jis	kā	
ḥukm	us	ne	Nūḥ	ko	diyā	aur	jo	Ham	ne	
tumhāri	ṭaraf	waḥi	ki	aur	jis	kā	ḥukm	ham	
ne	Ibrāhim	aur	Mūsā	aur	'Isā	ko	diyā	ki	din	
theek	rakho	aur	us	meiñ	phoot	na	dālo	
mushrikoñ	par	bahut	hi	girāñ	hai	woh	jis	ki	
ṭarf	tum	unheñ	bulāte	ho,	aur	Allāh	apne	
qareeb	ke	liye	chun	letā	hai	jise	chāhe	aur	
apni	ṭaraf	rāh	detā	hai	usey	jo	ruju'a	lāye

arabicText: وَمَا تَفَرَّقُوٓا۟ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعِلْمُ بَغْيًۢا بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةٌۭ سَبَقَتْ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰٓ أَجَلٍۢ مُّسَمًّۭى لَّقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ أُورِثُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ مِنۢ بَعْدِهِمْ لَفِى شَكٍّۢ مِّنْهُ مُرِيبٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	did	not	cause	divisions	except	
after	the	knowledge	had	come	to	them,	
because	of	jealousy	among	themselves;	
and	were	it	not	for	a	Word	that	had	already	
gone	forth	from	your	Lord,	the	judgement	would	have	been	passed	upon	them	long	ago;	and	
indeed	those	who	inherited	the	Book	after	them	are	in	an	intriguing	doubt	regarding	it.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	unhoñ	ne	phot	na	dāli	magar	b'ād	is	ke	ke	unheñ	'Ilm	ā	chuka	thā	āpas	ke	ḥasad	se	aur	agar	
tumhāre	Rab	ki	aik	bāt	guzar	na	chuki	hoti	aik	muqarrar	mi'ād	tak	to	kab	kā	un	meiñ	faisla	kar	
diyā	hotā	aur	be-shak	woh	jo	un	ke	b'ad	Kitāb	ke	wāris	huye	woh	us	se	aik	dhokā	dālne	wāle	shak	
meiñ	hiañ

arabicText: فَلِذَٰلِكَ فَٱدْعُ ۖ وَٱسْتَقِمْ كَمَآ أُمِرْتَ ۖ وَلَا تَتَّبِعْ أَهْوَآءَهُمْ ۖ وَقُلْ ءَامَنتُ بِمَآ أَنزَلَ ٱللَّهُ مِن كِتَـٰبٍۢ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ لِأَعْدِلَ بَيْنَكُمُ ۖ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّنَا وَرَبُّكُمْ ۖ لَنَآ أَعْمَـٰلُنَا وَلَكُمْ أَعْمَـٰلُكُمْ ۖ لَا حُجَّةَ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمُ ۖ ٱللَّهُ يَجْمَعُ بَيْنَنَا ۖ وَإِلَيْهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
For	this	reason,	call	them	(to	Islam);	and	remain	firm,	as	you	are	commanded	to;	and	do	not	follow	
their	desires;	and	say,	“I	accept	faith	in	whichever	Book	Allah	has	sent	down;	and	I	am	
commanded	to	judge	fairly	between	you;	Allah	is	the	Lord	of	all	-	ours	and	yours;	for	us	are	our	
deeds	and	for	you	are	your	misdeeds;	there	is	no	debate	between	us	and	you;	Allah	will	gather	
all	of	us	together;	and	towards	Him	is	the	return.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	isi	liye	bulāō	aur	sābit	qadam	raho	jaisā	tumheñ	ḥukm	huā	hai	aur	un	ki	khwāhishoñ	par	na	
chalo	aur	kaho	ke	maiñ	Imān	lāyā	us	par	jo	koyi	kitāb	Allāh	ne	utāri	aur	mujhe	ḥukm	hai	ke	maiñ	
tum	meiñ	insāf	karoñ	Allāh	hamārā	tumhārā	sab	kā	Rab	hai	hamāre	liye	hamārā	'amal	aur	
tumhāre	liye	tumhārā	kiyā	koyi	ḥujjat	nahiñ	ham	meiñ	aur	tum	meiñ	Allāh	ham	sab	ko	jam'a	kare	
gā	aur	usi	ki	ṭāraf	phirnā	hai.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُحَآجُّونَ فِى ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا ٱسْتُجِيبَ لَهُۥ حُجَّتُهُمْ دَاحِضَةٌ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ وَعَلَيْهِمْ غَضَبٌۭ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	fight	regarding	Allah	after	
the	Muslims	have	accepted	His	call,	their	
reasoning	does	not	hold	at	all	before	their	
Lord,	and	upon	them	is	wrath,	and	for	
them	is	a	severe	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	Allāh	ke	bāre	meiñ	jhagardte	
haiñ	b'ad	iske	ke	Musalmān	is	ki	d'awat	
qubool	kar	chuke	un	ki	daleel	maḥaz	be	
sabāt	hai	un	ke	rab	ke	pās	aur	un	par	
ghazab	hai	aur	un	ke	liye	sakht	'aƶāb	hai

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِىٓ أَنزَلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَٱلْمِيزَانَ ۗ وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ قَرِيبٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	Allah	Who	has	sent	down	the	Book	
with	the	truth,	and	the	Scales	of	Justice;	
and	what	do	you	know	-	possibly	the	Last	
Day	could	really	be	near!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	hai	jis	ne	ḥaq	ke	sāth	kitāb	utāri	aur	
insāb	ki	tarāzo	aur	tum	kyā	jāno	shāyad	
Qiyāmat	qareeb	hi	ho

arabicText: يَسْتَعْجِلُ بِهَا ٱلَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهَا ۖ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ مُشْفِقُونَ مِنْهَا وَيَعْلَمُونَ أَنَّهَا ٱلْحَقُّ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُمَارُونَ فِى ٱلسَّاعَةِ لَفِى ضَلَـٰلٍۭ بَعِيدٍ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	do	not	believe	in	it	are	
impatient	for	it,	and	those	who	believe	in	it	
fear	it	and	know	that	indeed	it	is	the	truth;	
pay	heed!	Those	who	doubt	the	Last	Day	
are	certainly	in	extreme	error.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Us	ki	jaldi	machā	rahe	haiñ	woh	jo	is	par	
Imān	nahiñ	rakhte	aur	jinheñ	us	par	Imān	
hai	woh	us	se	dar	rahe	haiñ	aur	jānte	haiñ	
ke	be-shak	woh	ḥaq	hai	sunte	ho	be-shak	
jo	Qiyāmat	meiñ	shak	karte	haiñ	zaroor	
door	ki	gumrāhi	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ لَطِيفٌۢ بِعِبَادِهِۦ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ ۖ وَهُوَ ٱلْقَوِىُّ ٱلْعَزِيزُ
englishTranslationText:
Allah	is	Benevolent	upon	His	bondmen	-	
He	bestows	sustenance	to	whomever	He	
wills;	and	He	only	is	the	All	Powerful,	the	
Most	Honourable.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	pane	bandoñ	par	luṭf	farmātā	hai	jise	
chāhe	rozi	detā	hai	aur	wohi	quwwat-o
'izzat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: مَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ حَرْثَ ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ نَزِدْ لَهُۥ فِى حَرْثِهِۦ ۖ وَمَن كَانَ يُرِيدُ حَرْثَ ٱلدُّنْيَا نُؤْتِهِۦ مِنْهَا وَمَا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ مِن نَّصِيبٍ
englishTranslationText:
Whoever	aspires	for	the	yield	of	the	
Hereafter	-	We	increase	its	yield	for	him;	
and	whoever	aspires	for	the	yield	of	this	
world	-	We	give	him	part	of	it,	and	he	has	
no	portion	in	the	Hereafter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jo	Āakhirat	ki	kheti	chāhe	ham	us	ke	liye	us	
ki	kheti	badhāyeñ	aur	jo	duniyā	ki	kheti	
chāhe	ham	usey	us	meiñ	se	kuchh	deñ	ge	
aur	Āakhirat	meiñ	us	kā	kuch	ḥissa	nahiñ

arabicText: أَمْ لَهُمْ شُرَكَـٰٓؤُا۟ شَرَعُوا۟ لَهُم مِّنَ ٱلدِّينِ مَا لَمْ يَأْذَنۢ بِهِ ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَلَوْلَا كَلِمَةُ ٱلْفَصْلِ لَقُضِىَ بَيْنَهُمْ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Or	do	they	have	associate	deities	who	have	
appointed	for	them	a	religion,	which	Allah	
has	not	permitted?	And	were	it	not	for	a	
Word	that	had	already	been	decided,	the	
judgement	would	have	been	passed	between	them	here	itself;	and	indeed	for	the	unjust	is	a	
painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	un	ke	liye	kuch	shareek	haiñ	jinhoñ	ne	un	ke	liye	woh	deen	nikāl	diyā	hai	ke	Allāh	ne	us	ki	
ijāzat	na	di	aur	agar	aik	faisla	kā	w'ada	na	hotā	to	yahiñ	un	meiñ	faisla	kar	diyā	jātā	aur	be-shak	
zālimoñ	ke	liye	dard-nāk	'aƶāb	hai

arabicText: تَرَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ مُشْفِقِينَ مِمَّا كَسَبُوا۟ وَهُوَ وَاقِعٌۢ بِهِمْ ۗ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فِى رَوْضَاتِ ٱلْجَنَّاتِ ۖ لَهُم مَّا يَشَآءُونَ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ هُوَ ٱلْفَضْلُ ٱلْكَبِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
You	will	see	the	unjust	getting	terrified	of	their	own	deeds,	and	(evil	of)	their	deeds	will	certainly	
befall	them;	and	(that)	those	who	accepted	faith	and	performed	good	deeds	are	in	blossoming	
Gardens	of	Paradise;	for	them	is	whatever	they	wish	from	their	Lord;	this	only	is	the	great	
munificence	(of	Allah).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	zālimoñ	ko	dekho	ge	ke	apni	kamāiyoñ	se	sahme	huye	hoñ	ge	aur	woh	un	par	pad	kar	raheñ	
gi	aur	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	achche	kām	kiye	woh	jannat	ki	phulwāriyoñ	meiñ	haiñ	un	ke	liye	un	ke	
rab	ke	pās	haiñ	jo	chāheñ	yahi	badā	fazl	hai.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلَّذِى يُبَشِّرُ ٱللَّهُ عِبَادَهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ ۗ قُل لَّآ أَسْـَٔلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ أَجْرًا إِلَّا ٱلْمَوَدَّةَ فِى ٱلْقُرْبَىٰ ۗ وَمَن يَقْتَرِفْ حَسَنَةًۭ نَّزِدْ لَهُۥ فِيهَا حُسْنًا ۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٌۭ شَكُورٌ
englishTranslationText:
This	is	what	Allah	gives	the	glad	tidings	of	
to	His	bondmen	who	accept	faith	and	do	
good	deeds;	say	(O	dear	Prophet	
Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	“I	do	not	ask	any	fee	from	you	upon	
this,	except	the	love	between	close	ones”;	
and	whoever	performs	a	good	deed	-	We	
further	increase	the	goodness	in	it	for	him;	
indeed	Allah	is	Oft	Forgiving,	Most	
Appreciative.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	hai	woh	jis	ki	khush	khabri	detā	hai	
Allāh	apne	bandoñ	ko	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	
achche	kām	kiye	tum	farmāō	maiñ	is	par	
tum	se	kuchh		ujrat	nahiñ	māñgtā		magar	
qarābat	ki	muḥabbat	aur	jo	nek	kām	kare	
ham	us	ke	liye	us	meiñ	aur	khoobi	
badhāyeñ	be-shak	Allāh	bakhsh	ne	wālā	
qadr	farmāne	wālā	hai.

arabicText: أَمْ يَقُولُونَ ٱفْتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًۭا ۖ فَإِن يَشَإِ ٱللَّهُ يَخْتِمْ عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ ۗ وَيَمْحُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْبَـٰطِلَ وَيُحِقُّ ٱلْحَقَّ بِكَلِمَـٰتِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ
englishTranslationText:
What!	They	dare	say	that,	“He	has	
fabricated	a	lie	against	Allah”?	And	if	Allah	
wills,	He	can	seal	your	heart	by	His	mercy	
and	protection	*;	and	Allah	wipes	out	
falsehood	and	proves	the	truth	by	His	
Words;	indeed	He	knows	what	lies	within	
the	hearts.	(*	So	that	you	may	not	be	
agonised	by	what	they	do).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	yeh	kahte	haiñ	ke	unhoñ	ne	Allāh	par	
jhoot	bāñdh	liyā	aur	Allāh	chāhe	to	
tumhare	dil	par	apni	raḥmat	o	ḥifāzat	ki	
muhar	farmā	de	aur	mitātā	hai	bāṭil	ko	aur	
ḥaq	ko	sābit	farmātā	hai	apni	batoñ	se	be
shak	woh	diloñ	ki	bāteñ	jāntā	hai

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يَقْبَلُ ٱلتَّوْبَةَ عَنْ عِبَادِهِۦ وَيَعْفُوا۟ عَنِ ٱلسَّيِّـَٔاتِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	accepts	repentance	from	
His	bondmen,	and	pardons	sins	*,	and	
knows	all	your	deeds.	(Repentance	for	the	
cardinal	sins,	while	lesser	sins	are	wiped	out	
by	good	deeds.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	wohi		hai	jo	apne	bandoñ	ki	tauba	
qubol	farmātā	aur	gunāhoñ	se	darguzar	
farmātā	hai	aur	jāntā	hai	jo	kuch	tum	karte	
ho

arabicText: وَيَسْتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ وَيَزِيدُهُم مِّن فَضْلِهِۦ ۚ وَٱلْكَـٰفِرُونَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌۭ شَدِيدٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	He	accepts	the	prayers	of	those	who	
accept	faith	and	do	good	deeds,	and	gives	
them	a	greater	reward	by	His	munificence;	and	for	the	disbelievers	is	a	severe	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	Du'ā	qubool	farmātā	hai	un	ki	jo	imān	
lāye	aur	achche	kām	kiye	aur	unheñ	apne	
fazl	se	aur	in'ām	detā	hai	aur	kāfiroñ	ke	
liye	sakht	'aƶāb	hai.

arabicText: ۞ وَلَوْ بَسَطَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلرِّزْقَ لِعِبَادِهِۦ لَبَغَوْا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَـٰكِن يُنَزِّلُ بِقَدَرٍۢ مَّا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ بِعِبَادِهِۦ خَبِيرٌۢ بَصِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	had	Allah	increased	the	sustenance	for	all	His	slaves,	they	would	have	surely	caused	turmoil	
in	the	land,	but	He	sends	it	down	by	a	proper	assessment	as	He	wills;	indeed	He	is	Well	Aware	of,	
Seeing	His	bondmen.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	agar	Allāh	apne	sab	bandoñ	kā	rizq	wasi'a	kar	detā	to	zaroor		zamin	meiñ	fasād	phelāte	lekin	
woh	andāze	se	utārtā	hai	jitnā	chāhe	be-shak	woh	apne	bandoñ	se	khabardār	hai.

arabicText: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى يُنَزِّلُ ٱلْغَيْثَ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا قَنَطُوا۟ وَيَنشُرُ رَحْمَتَهُۥ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْوَلِىُّ ٱلْحَمِيدُ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	He	Who	sends	down	the	rain	when	they	have	despaired,	and	spreads	out	His	mercy;	and	
He	is	the	Benefactor,	the	Most	Praiseworthy.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unheñ	dekhtā	hai	aur	wohi		hai	ke	miñh	utārtā	hai	un	ke	nā-ummid	hone	par	aur	apni	Raḥmat	
phailātā	hai	aur	wohi	kām	banane	wālā	hai	sab	khoobiyoñ	sarāhā

arabicText: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِۦ خَلْقُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَثَّ فِيهِمَا مِن دَآبَّةٍۢ ۚ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ جَمْعِهِمْ إِذَا يَشَآءُ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	His	signs	is	the	creation	of	the	heavens	and	the	earth,	and	the	moving	creatures	
dispersed	in	it;	and	He	is	Able	to	gather	them	whenever	He	wills.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	ki	nishāniyoñ	se	hai	āasmānoñ	aur	zamin	ki	paidāish	aur	jo	chalne	wāle	in	meiñ	phailāye	
aur	woh	un	ke	ikat_thā	karne	par	jab	chāhe	qādir	hai

arabicText: وَمَآ أَصَـٰبَكُم مِّن مُّصِيبَةٍۢ فَبِمَا كَسَبَتْ أَيْدِيكُمْ وَيَعْفُوا۟ عَن كَثِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	whatever	calamity	befalls	you,	is	because	of	what	your	hands	have	earned	-	and	there	is	a	
great	deal	He	pardons!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tumheñ	jo	musibat	pahuñchi	woh	us	ke	sabab	se	hai	jo	tumhāre	hāthoñ	ne	kamāyā	aur	bahut	
kuchh		to	mu'āf	farmā	detā	hai.

arabicText: وَمَآ أَنتُم بِمُعْجِزِينَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۖ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ وَلَا نَصِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	you	cannot	escape	in	the	earth;	and	you	have	neither	a	friend	nor	any	supporter	against	
Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	zamin	meiñ	qābu	se	nahiñ	nikal	sakte	aur	na	Allāh	ke	muqābil	tumhārā	koyi	dost	na	
madadgār.

arabicText: وَمِنْ ءَايَـٰتِهِ ٱلْجَوَارِ فِى ٱلْبَحْرِ كَٱلْأَعْلَـٰمِ
englishTranslationText:
And	among	His	signs	are	the	ships	sailing	
on	the	sea,	like	hills.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	us	ki	nishāniyoñ	se	haiñ	dariyā	meiñ	
chalne	wāliyāñ	jaise	pahādiyāñ.

arabicText: إِن يَشَأْ يُسْكِنِ ٱلرِّيحَ فَيَظْلَلْنَ رَوَاكِدَ عَلَىٰ ظَهْرِهِۦٓ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍۢ لِّكُلِّ صَبَّارٍۢ شَكُورٍ
englishTranslationText:
If	He	wills,	He	can	calm	the	winds	so	the	
ships	remain	still	on	the	sea	surface;	
indeed	in	this	are	signs	for	every	greatly	
enduring,	grateful	person.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh		chāhe	to	hawā	thamā	de	ke	us	ki	pith	
par	thahri	rah	jāyeñ	be-shak	us	meiñ	
zaroor	nishāniyāñ	haiñ	har	bade	sābir	
shākir	ko

arabicText: أَوْ يُوبِقْهُنَّ بِمَا كَسَبُوا۟ وَيَعْفُ عَن كَثِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Or	He	can	ruin	them	due	to	peoples’	sins	
and	He	can	forgive	a	great	deal.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	unheñ	tabāh	kar	de	logoñ	ke	gunāhoñ	
ke	sabab	aur	bahut	kuchh		mu’āf		farmā	de

arabicText: وَيَعْلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَـٰدِلُونَ فِىٓ ءَايَـٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	for	those	who	dispute	regarding	Our	
signs	to	realise;	that	they	do	not	have	a	
place	to	escape	to.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jān	jāyeñ	woh	jo	Hamāri	Āayatoñ	meiñ	
jhagadte	haiñ	ke	unheñ	kahiñ	bhagne	ki	
jagah	nahiñ

arabicText: فَمَآ أُوتِيتُم مِّن شَىْءٍۢ فَمَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَمَا عِندَ ٱللَّهِ خَيْرٌۭ وَأَبْقَىٰ لِلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَلَىٰ رَبِّهِمْ يَتَوَكَّلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Whatever	you	have	received	is	only	for	
usage	in	the	life	of	this	world,	and	that	
which	is	with	Allah	is	much	better	and	
more	lasting	-	for	those	who	believe	and	
rely	upon	their	Lord.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tumheñ	jo	kuch	milā	hai	woh	jiti	duniyā	
meiñ	baratne	kā	hai	aur	woh	jo	Allāh	ke	
pās	hai	behtar	hai	aur	ziyāda	bāqi	rahne	
wālā	un	ke	liye	jo	imān	lāye	aur	apne	Rab	
par	bharosa	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يَجْتَنِبُونَ كَبَـٰٓئِرَ ٱلْإِثْمِ وَٱلْفَوَٰحِشَ وَإِذَا مَا غَضِبُوا۟ هُمْ يَغْفِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	(for)	those	who	avoid	cardinal	sins	
and	indecencies,	and	forgive	(even)	when	
they	are	angry.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	bade	bade	gunāhoñ	aur	be
ḥayāiyoñ	se	bachte	haiñ	aur	jab	gussa	āaye	
mu’āf		kar	dete	haiñ.

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ ٱسْتَجَابُوا۟ لِرَبِّهِمْ وَأَقَامُوا۟ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَأَمْرُهُمْ شُورَىٰ بَيْنَهُمْ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	obeyed	the	command	of	
their	Lord	and	kept	the	prayer	established;	
and	whose	affairs	are	with	mutual	
consultation;	and	who	spend	in	Our	cause	
from	what	We	have	bestowed	upon	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jinhoñ	ne	apne	Rab	kā	ḥukm	
mānā	aur	Namāz	qāim	rakhi	aur	un	kā	kām	
un	ke	āapas	ke	mashware	se	hai	aur	
hamāre	diye	se	kuch	hamāri	rāh	meiñ	
kharch	karte	haiñ

arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلْبَغْىُ هُمْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	those	who	take	revenge	when	
rebellion	harms	them.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	ke	jab	unheñ	baghāwat	pahuñche	
badla	lete	haiñ

arabicText: وَجَزَٰٓؤُا۟ سَيِّئَةٍۢ سَيِّئَةٌۭ مِّثْلُهَا ۖ فَمَنْ عَفَا وَأَصْلَحَ فَأَجْرُهُۥ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
The	retribution	of	a	harmful	deed	is	the	
harm	equal	to	it;	so	whoever	forgives	and	
makes	amends,	so	his	reward	is	upon	Allah;	indeed	He	does	not	befriend	the	unjust.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	burāyi	kā	badla	usi	ki	barābar	burāyi	
hai	to	jis	ne	mu’āf		kiyā	aur	kām	sañwārā	to	
us	kā	ajr	Allāh	par	hai	be-shak	woh	dost	nahiñ	rakhtā	zālimoñ	ko

arabicText: وَلَمَنِ ٱنتَصَرَ بَعْدَ ظُلْمِهِۦ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ مَا عَلَيْهِم مِّن سَبِيلٍ
englishTranslationText: And	there	is	no	way	of	reproach	against	those	who	take	revenge	after	being	wronged.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	jis	ne	apni	mazlomi	par	badla	liyā	un	par	kuch	mu’ākhaƶe	ki	rāh	nahiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّمَا ٱلسَّبِيلُ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَظْلِمُونَ ٱلنَّاسَ وَيَبْغُونَ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ ٱلْحَقِّ ۚ أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Reproach	is	only	against	those	who	oppress	people,	and	wrongfully	spread	rebellion	in	the	land;	
for	them	is	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Mu’ākhaƶa	to	unhiñ	par	hai	jo	logoñ	par	zulm	karte	haiñ	aur	zameen	meiñ	nā-ḥaq	sarkashi	
phailāte	haiñ	un	ke	liye	dard-nāk	'aƶāb	hai.

arabicText: وَلَمَن صَبَرَ وَغَفَرَ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ لَمِنْ عَزْمِ ٱلْأُمُورِ
englishTranslationText: And	indeed	whoever	patiently	endured	and	forgave	-	then	indeed	these	are	acts	of	great	courage.
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur	be-shak	jis	ne	sabr	kiyā	aur	bakhsh	diyā	to	yeh	zaroor	himmat	ke	kām	haiñ.

arabicText: وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن وَلِىٍّۢ مِّنۢ بَعْدِهِۦ ۗ وَتَرَى ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ لَمَّا رَأَوُا۟ ٱلْعَذَابَ يَقُولُونَ هَلْ إِلَىٰ مَرَدٍّۢ مِّن سَبِيلٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	whomever	Allah	sends	astray,	there	is	no	friend	for	him	against	Allah;	and	you	will	see	the	
unjust	when	they	behold	the	punishment	saying,	“Is	there	a	way	to	return?”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jise	Allāh	gumrāh	kare	us	kā	koyi	rafeeq	nahiñ	Allāh	ke	muqābil	aur	tum	zālimoñ	ko	dekho	
ge	ke	jab	'aƶāb	dekheñ	ge	kaheñ	ge	kiyā	wāpas	jāne	kā	koyi	rāsta	hai?

arabicText: وَتَرَىٰهُمْ يُعْرَضُونَ عَلَيْهَا خَـٰشِعِينَ مِنَ ٱلذُّلِّ يَنظُرُونَ مِن طَرْفٍ خَفِىٍّۢ ۗ وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓا۟ إِنَّ ٱلْخَـٰسِرِينَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓا۟ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَأَهْلِيهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ فِى عَذَابٍۢ مُّقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	you	will	see	them	being	presented	
upon	the	fire,	cowering	with	disgrace	
watching	with	concealed	eyes;	and	the	
believers	will	say,	“Indeed	ruined	are	those	
who	have	lost	themselves	and	their	
families	on	the	Day	of	Resurrection”;	pay	
heed!	Indeed	the	unjust	are	in	a	
punishment	that	will	never	end.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	tum	unheñ	dekho	ge	ke	āag	par	pesh	
kiye	jāte	haiñ	ƶillat	se	dabe	lache	chupi	
nigāhoñ	dekhte	haiñ	aur	imān	wāle	kahēñ	
ge	be-shak	hār	meiñ	woh	haiñ	jo	apni	jāneñ	
aur	apne	ghar	wāle	hār	baithe	Qiyāmat	ke	
din	sunte	ho	be-shak	zālim	hamesha	ke	
'aƶāb	meiñ	haiñ

arabicText: وَمَا كَانَ لَهُم مِّنْ أَوْلِيَآءَ يَنصُرُونَهُم مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَمَن يُضْلِلِ ٱللَّهُ فَمَا لَهُۥ مِن سَبِيلٍ
englishTranslationText:
And	they	had	no	friends	to	help	them	
against	Allah;	and	there	is	no	way	for	one	
whom	Allah	sends	astray.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	un	ke	koyi	dost	na	huye	ke	Allāh	ke	
muqābil	un	ki	madad	karte	aur	jise	Allāh	
gumrāh	kare	us	ke	liye	kaheñ	rāsta	nahiñ

arabicText: ٱسْتَجِيبُوا۟ لِرَبِّكُم مِّن قَبْلِ أَن يَأْتِىَ يَوْمٌۭ لَّا مَرَدَّ لَهُۥ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ ۚ مَا لَكُم مِّن مَّلْجَإٍۢ يَوْمَئِذٍۢ وَمَا لَكُم مِّن نَّكِيرٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
Obey	your	Lord	before	the	advent	of	a	Day	
from	Allah,	which	cannot	be	averted;	you	
will	not	have	any	refuge	on	that	day,	nor	
will	you	be	able	to	deny.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Apne	Rab	kā	ḥukm	māno	us	din	ke	āane	se	
pahle	jo	Allāh	ki	ṭaraf	se	talne	wālā	nahiñ	
us	din	tumheñ	koyi	panāh	na	hogi	aur	na	
tumheñ	inkār	karte	bane

arabicText: فَإِنْ أَعْرَضُوا۟ فَمَآ أَرْسَلْنَـٰكَ عَلَيْهِمْ حَفِيظًا ۖ إِنْ عَلَيْكَ إِلَّا ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ۗ وَإِنَّآ إِذَآ أَذَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِنَّا رَحْمَةًۭ فَرِحَ بِهَا ۖ وَإِن تُصِبْهُمْ سَيِّئَةٌۢ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ فَإِنَّ ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ كَفُورٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
So	if	they	turn	away	from	you,	We	have	not	
sent	you	as	a	guardian	over	them;	upon	
you	is	nothing	but	to	convey	(the	message);	
and	when	We	make	man	taste	some	mercy	
from	Us,	he	rejoices	upon	it;	and	if	some	
harm	reaches	them	because	of	what	their	
own	hands	have	sent	before,	thereupon	
man	is	ungrateful!
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	agar	woh	moñh	phereñ	to	ham	ne	
tumheñ	un	par	nigehbān	banā	kar	nahiñ	
bhejā	tum	par	to	nahiñ	magar	pahuñchā	
denā	aur	jab	ham	āadmi	ko	apni	ṭaraf	se	
kisi	Raḥmat	kā	maza	dete	haiñ	is	par	khush	
jo	jātā	hai	aur	agar	unheñ	koyi	burāyi	
pahuñche	badla	us	kā	jo	un	ke	hāthoñ	ne	
āage	bhejā	to	insān	badā	nā-shukrā	hai

arabicText: لِّلَّهِ مُلْكُ ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضِ ۚ يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ يَهَبُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ إِنَـٰثًۭا وَيَهَبُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ ٱلذُّكُورَ
englishTranslationText:
For	Allah	only	is	the	kingship	of	the	
heavens	and	the	earth;	He	creates	
whatever	He	wills;	He	may	bestow	
daughters	to	whomever	He	wills,	and	sons	
to	whomever	He	wills.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	hi	ke	liye	hai	āsmānoñ	aur	zamin	ki	
salṭanat	paidā	kartā	hai	jo	chāhe	jise	chāhe	betiyāñ	'aṭā	farmāye	aur	jise	chāhe	bete	de

arabicText: أَوْ يُزَوِّجُهُمْ ذُكْرَانًۭا وَإِنَـٰثًۭا ۖ وَيَجْعَلُ مَن يَشَآءُ عَقِيمًا ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِيمٌۭ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Or	may	mix	them,	the	sons	and	daughters;	and	may	make	barren	whomever	He	wills;	indeed	He	
is	All	Knowing,	Able.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yā	donoñ	milā	de	bete	aur	betiyāñ	aur	jise	chāhe	bāñjh	kar	de	be-shak	woh	'ilm-o-qudrat	wālā	
hai.

arabicText: ۞ وَمَا كَانَ لِبَشَرٍ أَن يُكَلِّمَهُ ٱللَّهُ إِلَّا وَحْيًا أَوْ مِن وَرَآئِ حِجَابٍ أَوْ يُرْسِلَ رَسُولًۭا فَيُوحِىَ بِإِذْنِهِۦ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ عَلِىٌّ حَكِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
And	it	is	not	for	any	human	that	Allah	may	speak	to	him	except	as	a	divine	revelation	or	while	the	
human	is	on	this	side	of	the	veil	of	greatness,	or	that	He	sends	an	angel	to	reveal	by	His	
permission,	whatever	He	wills;	indeed	He	is	Supreme,	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kisi	āadmi	ko	nahiñ	pahuñchtā	ke	Allāh	us	se	kalām	farmāye	magar	waḥi	ke	ṭāur	par	yā	yuñ	
ke	woh	bashar	parda-e-'azmat	ke	udhar	ho	yā	koyi	Farishta	bheje	ke	woh	us	ke	ḥukm	se	waḥi	
kare	jo	woh	chāhe	be-shak	woh	bulandi	wa	ḥikmat	wālā	hai.

arabicText: وَكَذَٰلِكَ أَوْحَيْنَآ إِلَيْكَ رُوحًۭا مِّنْ أَمْرِنَا ۚ مَا كُنتَ تَدْرِى مَا ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ وَلَا ٱلْإِيمَـٰنُ وَلَـٰكِن جَعَلْنَـٰهُ نُورًۭا نَّهْدِى بِهِۦ مَن نَّشَآءُ مِنْ عِبَادِنَا ۚ وَإِنَّكَ لَتَهْدِىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍۢ مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
And	this	is	how	We	sent	the	divine	
revelation	to	you	(O	dear	Prophet	
Muhammad	-	peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	-	a	life	giving	thing,	by	Our	command;	
neither	did	you	know	the	Book	nor	the	
detailed	commands	of	religion,	but	We	
have	made	this	Qur’an	a	light	by	which	We	
guide	whomever	We	will	from	Our	
bondmen;	and	indeed	you	surely	do	guide	
to	the	Straight	Path.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yuñhi	Ham	ne	tumheñ	Waḥi	bheji	aik	
jānfizā	cheez	apne	ḥukm	se	us	se	pahle	na	
tum	Kitāb	jānte	they	na	Aḥkām-e-Shar'a	ki	
tafseel	hāñ	ham	ne	usey	Noor	kiyā	jis	se	
ham	rāh	dikhāte	haiñ	apne	bandoñ	se	jise	
chāhte	haiñ	aur	be-shak	tum	zaroor	seedhi	
rāh	batāte	ho

arabicText: صِرَٰطِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِى لَهُۥ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ أَلَآ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ تَصِيرُ ٱلْأُمُورُ
englishTranslationText:
The	path	of	Allah	-	the	One	to	Whom	only	
belongs	all	whatever	is	in	the	heavens	and	
all	whatever	is	in	the	earth;	pay	heed!	
Towards	Allah	only	do	all	matters	return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allāh	ki	rāh	ke	usi	kā	hai	jo	kuchh		
āasmānoñ	meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuchh	zameen	
meiñ	sunte	ho	sab	kām	Allāh	hi	ki	ṭaraf	
phirte	haiñ.
